ARABIC: وَتَرَى ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ يَوْمَئِذٍ مُّقَرَّنِينَ فِى ٱلْأَصْفَادِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: that Day you will see the evildoers yoked together in chains,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: You will see the wicked on that day bound together in chains.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: On that Day you shall see the guilty ones secured in chains;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: you will see the guilty ones bound in chains,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And on that day you will see the guilty linked together in chains.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And you will see the criminals that Day, Muqarranun (bound together) in fetters.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And you will see the guilty on that day linked together in chains.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And thou shalt see the sinners that day coupled in fetters,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Thou wilt see the guilty on that day linked together in chains,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: On that Day you shall see the guilty bound in chains,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And thou wilt see the guilty on that Day bound together in fetters.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: —on that day you will see the guilty bound together in chains,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And thou wilt see the sinners that day bound together in fetters;-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And you will see the Mujrimun (criminals, disbelievers in the Oneness of Allah Islamic Monotheism, polytheists, disobedient to Allah, etc.) that Day bound together in fetters; [Muqarranun in fetters; mean:- with their hands and feet tied to their necks with chains.]
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: On that Day, you shall see the sinners coupled together in fetters;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: On that Day, you will see the sinners bound together in chains.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And you will see the criminals that Day bound together in shackles,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [14:49] And you shall see, O Muhammad (s), the sinners, the disbelievers, on that day coupled, chained together with their [individual] devils, in chains, manacles or collars,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Thou wilt see the guilty) the idolaters (on that day) the Day of Judgement (linked together in chains) with the satans.
